level.heading: Priority of security interests in letter-of-credit right.
level.text: The following rules govern priority among conflicting security interests in the same letter-of-credit right:

A security interest held by a secured party having control of the letter-of-credit right under § 28:9-107 has priority to the extent of its control over a conflicting security interest held by a secured party that does not have control.
Security interests perfected by control under § 28:9-314 rank according to priority in time of obtaining control.
